title: Premarket London: Anglo American Guides Lower on Copper Output By Investing.com
text:
Premarket London: Anglo American Guides Lower on Copper Output

Forex 7 hours ago (Oct 22, 2019 08:20)

© Reuters. Investing.com -- Here's a summary of this morning's big releases on the London Stock Exchange. Please refresh for updates. Anglo American (LON: ) said its output this year would be at the lower end of expectations due to a chronic drought in Chile that also threatens next year’s production. AA also reported a 14% drop in diamond output at its De Beers subsidiary. These negative factors were offset by the successful ramp up of its iron ore mine at Minas-Rio in Brazil. The company said it’s “broadly on track” to deliver its full-year production targets
